items.sentence: I can't help feeling something terrible is going to happen.
There are people of many different races living in America.
Some insist that the Spanish hostel is a pornographic film.
French is the only foreign language that I'm able to speak.
Does Tom really think that he can convince Mary to do that?
Giraffes are known to eat over a hundred species of plants.
Doing it this way will save a lot of money in the long run.
I'd take anybody apart who dared to say a word against her.
The majority of large Japanese companies depend on exports.
Tom didn't want to tell you, but I told him that he should.
Tom enjoyed the story Mary told him and the other children.
Tom and Mary played together a lot when they were children.
You know that both Tom and Mary want to do that, don't you?
Don't play dumb. You know very well what I'm talking about.
I thought that you said that you could legally drive a bus.
On average, how many cups of coffee do you drink every day?
Japan has been sending athletes to the Olympics since 1912.
If you'd run all the way, you'd have arrived there in time.
My music teacher was surprised to find out that I can cook.
Not just anyone would be willing to do something like that.
